coherent.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable
coherent.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
a coherent account of the incident
coherent.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if someone is coherent, they are talking in a way that is clear and easy to understand
coherent.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He sounded coherent, but he was too ill to have any idea what he was saying.
coherent.translation[0].definitions[2].d: if a group is coherent, its members are connected or united because they share common aims, qualities, or beliefs
coherent.translation[0].definitions[2].e: They were never a coherent group.
